overview_of_class: An examination of women in rock music from the inception of the genre through today.
name: Gender, Sexuality, and Performance
title: WCAS GNDR_ST 372-0-20 Gender, Sexuality, and Performance

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: An examination of women in rock music from the inception of the genre through today.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value: A selection of scholarly and journalistic writings about women and rock music, with an emphasis on the music itself as well as social and cultural frames around it.

subject: GNDR_ST
